comments.body:
Looks like there are some new options: https://github.com/facebook/create-react-app/tree/master/packages/react-dev-utils#createcompilerargs-object-webpackcompiler
Also would be nice to have it exported as a `CreateCompilerOptions` interface to easier usage.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +22,26 @@ * To provide the `urls` argument, use `prepareUrls()` described below.
 */
export function createCompiler(opts: {
    webpack: typeof webpack,
    config: webpack.Configuration,
